scripts.copy: cp -rf src/assets dist && cp -rf src/assets dist && cp -rf src/fonts dist && cp -f src/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/css
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist/html && mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && mkdir -p dist/css/layouts && pug src/index.pug -o dist/ && uglifyjs src/js/app.js -m -o dist/js/app.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/ui.js -m -o dist/js/ui.min.js && stylus src/css/stylesheet.styl -o dist/css/stylesheet.css && stylus src/css/layouts/side-menu.styl -o dist/css/layouts/side-menu.css && npm run copy
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build-js
scripts.watch: concurrently 'stylus -w src/css/stylesheet.styl -o dist/css/stylesheet.css' 'stylus -w src/css/layouts/side-menu.styl -o dist/css/layouts/side-menu.css' 'pug -w src/index.pug -o dist/'
scripts.posttest: echo the test has been run!
